post.body: I wish I knew. LOL. I just repinged someone roses post who done them.not sure on the command. :)
some1 with a light sabre? What pix is that?
About 90% partying and 10% work, but last few days has been 100% partying.Im staying in tonight with my MacBook :)
ur not wrong. And yeah, i think most of the digicell network is set up now so signals should be working at this stage :) off home....
Was basically a boys big holiday to Panama ;) but we got paid. Class. lol Probably just as well we are heading home....
Djkus in da house http://is.gd/aMc4
the gucci watch is now sold from amazon. DOH!I was sort of hoping to buy it local in a real shop,so many fakes online.wasnt amazon
i assume the gallery (open to 10am) is well known in Panama for being a bit "dodgy"? lol great djs though!very cool
I showed the 2 cops by key card for my hotel,then i had to phone my m8 from hotel to confirm knew someone else here..20mins later.ok
yeah ill get the watch... wonder if i could pick it up anywhere in airport?maybe just use amazon,good for waranttee
nice screen grab.jealousu guys can get netflix streaming content.lucky gitz
nice.didnt see your message until now..my wife is by now slowly getting used to them.LOL not as bad a first one I got
thanks.she has the start of a cold at moment and is a little upset.looks v cute :)
omg!I know!I left the house without hat and gloves. Fail
omg!that's right!I forgot about that bar!that would explain a lot....LOL.randomly now having Christmas dinner with lynne +m8s.drink
agree,great for parties but crap at 1 player latenight gaming sessions.
parents probably buy them the ciggs.wouldn't suprise me at all
cheap cash registers and chip and pin machines too!
Santa is a dirty old man......
apart from Wii sports there really is no reason to own a Wii.with the new 360 dash+avatars the Wii looks very outdated very quick
what's wrong with davinas nice Christmas stockings man?
I know but,at that price I thought it was rude not to stock up :) fridge not even 1/5full so budweiser room
why oh why?
at least they didn't stop to throw soggy cabages at u.
nice.looks like colon mcrae rally on 360
never heard of fhm being categorized as current affairs.lol. Tits.i have to buy presents still.not had chance yet...Friday
Re-pinging @rdougan 
Fuck! What is this strange feeling?it's like someone has taken the sun and hidden it away.its cold here!!I need to go back to panama.lol.
Yeah!!coming through Newry. Almost home
OMg!?will we actually make it on the flight to Dublin from Atlanta?hell,we have a big open tab at the bar!LOL ;) http://snipurl.com/7soqt
Alright people!waz up!?!!! I hope we get on the plane. LOL
In Atlanta airport at moment, heading to Dublin, few more hours to go at the bar.... hard life.. lol
OMG!130am phone call to let me know change of plans and we are leaving for plane in 3 1/2 hours,5am instead of 5pm.FFS.Atlanta+Paris now
1230pm.Another early rise in Panama.lol Must try harder not to go out tonight....Some guys are still partying from last night!lol
Big meeting this morning!We are done with this project in panama early!Company here will be flying us back home asap.(few days be cool ;) )
Americans that never ended up meeting us at the club on Saturday had a reason:They were pulled by the cops,arrested and robbed of all money
Wow,whole weekend off and now back to work,heading to Dublin at moment.:( wish o2 would stop ripping me off on o2 ie
Since I've been away I only just discovered the new live service.love it!new avatars make Wiis look shit! http://snipurl.com/84d53
Anyone got guitar hero full band kit for 360?wanna join my band on live? Message me.
Eugggaan will win I guess.all people his age will vote for him,they usephones the most so i'd almost put money on it.
My new "music pirate"t shirt from jinx.com arrived finally.must wear it to hmv for photo. LOL. http://snipurl.com/7zuzi
Ruby is backing singer last night in our guitar hero band :) she loves the mad colours on the screen. LOL http://snipurl.com/7zgyb
Ruby is a snow bunny today.i can't get over hot cold it is here! http://snipurl.com/7z88x
Ruby just visited Santa for the first time http://gallery.me.com/djkus#100173
After 2 years I am now Wii less.since getting 360 in may I ain't used it so sold it to m8 tonight.(modded of course) any 1 else bored of wii
Re-pinging @DalekKiller: OMG Davina McCall is a tad 2 Xmasy 4 my liking :0
Mate picking up my Wii tomorrow.i guess it will cover thecost of my guitar hero band kit.
Finally got bored of my (modded) Wii.Had it since launch date.just can't beat 360 on live!anyone wanna join my band on guitar hero?LOL
Beer alan? All these beers were £20 In tesco!!! http://snipurl.com/8okdf
Ever get the feeling that some people from work are stalking u online ;)
Anyone spot me?clue..on the right of picture. LOL http://snipurl.com/8nwrx
Anyone else see this app as being an amazing spying device!!?? http://snipurl.com/8fcxb
